# @dnd-kit – Documentation

## dnd kit – Documentation

- [Overview](/readme.md): @dnd-kit – A lightweight, modular, performant, accessible and  extensible drag & drop toolkit for React.
- [Installation](/introduction/installation.md)
- [Quick start](/introduction/getting-started.md): Eager to get started? This quick start guide will help you familiarize yourself with the core concepts of dnd kit.
- [DndContext](/api-documentation/context-provider.md)
- [Collision detection algorithms](/api-documentation/context-provider/collision-detection-algorithms.md)
- [useDndContext](/api-documentation/context-provider/usedndcontext.md)
- [useDndMonitor](/api-documentation/context-provider/use-dnd-monitor.md)
- [Droppable](/api-documentation/droppable.md)
- [useDroppable](/api-documentation/droppable/usedroppable.md)
- [Draggable](/api-documentation/draggable.md)
- [useDraggable](/api-documentation/draggable/usedraggable.md)
- [Drag Overlay](/api-documentation/draggable/drag-overlay.md)
- [Sensors](/api-documentation/sensors.md)
- [Pointer](/api-documentation/sensors/pointer.md)
- [Mouse](/api-documentation/sensors/mouse.md)
- [Touch](/api-documentation/sensors/touch.md)
- [Keyboard](/api-documentation/sensors/keyboard.md)
- [Modifiers](/api-documentation/modifiers.md)
- [Sortable](/presets/sortable.md): The sortable preset provides the building blocks to build  sortable interfaces.
- [Sortable Context](/presets/sortable/sortable-context.md)
- [useSortable](/presets/sortable/usesortable.md)
- [Accessibility](/guides/accessibility.md)
